caption.p:
Antiproliferative activity of decoctions and controls against (a) Caco2 and (b) HeLa cancer cell lines measured as percentages of the untreated control cells. BO = B. obovata decoction; CE = C. equisetifolia decoction; ET = E. tetrodonta; PC = P. careya decoction; TC = T. carpentariae decoction; VV = V. vexillata decoction; NC = negative control (seawater); Cis = cisplatin control. Results are expressed as mean ± SEM of three independent experiments in triplicate ( n = 9).
∗ indicates results that are significantly different to the untreated control ( P < 0.01).
